Package utils

Class AppFactory

java.lang.Object
utils.AppFactory
public class AppFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating and managing all application components (DAOs, Services, and Controllers). Implements the Factory pattern to centralize object creation and provide easy access to all components.
Since:
2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sa√∫l Maldonado
